name: wonder-skin

effect.black-white: Non-damaging moves have exactly 50% base accuracy against this Pokémon.
effect.black-2-white-2: Non-damaging moves have exactly 50% base accuracy against this Pokémon.

short_effect: Lowers incoming non-damaging moves' base accuracy to exactly 50%.

flavor_text.black-white: Makes status-changing moves more likely to miss.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: Makes status-changing moves more likely to miss.
